data.title: Where Is Regent University?
data.meta_description: Learn more about the location of Regent University using this detailed map. See where Regent is and what the surrounding neighborhood is like.
data.text:
View a map that shows where Regent University is, and find out more about the surrounding neighborhood. Is the campus close enough to home for your liking? Be sure you can enjoy the area around the campus, too.

Why Location Matters

You won't spend all of your on campus when you attend the school. You should know if the area arround Regent is in a safe neighborhood and how close it is to other cities in the general area.

Regent University Location and Map

Located in Virginia Beach, Virginia, Regent University is a private not-for-profit institution. The surrounding area of the school is a good match for students who enjoy city life.

Location of Regent University

Contact details for Regent are given below.
